page.title: 02PENRHYNSIDE LITTLE ORME
page.content: {Penrhynside }is an old fashioned village with just one narrow street with houses on both sides. It has three{chapels} and two {pubs} and one village{shop.}The shop has been owned by the same family for over fifty years. It still has old fashioned scales and weights. My {house}used to be a shop - I think maybe two shops with two families living above them. The iron bar for the shop sign is still outside my bedroom window. The kitchen walls are rough rock because the house is built into the hillside. I quite like my house but it is very old. I much prefer modern houses. I would really like to live on Penrhyn Beach Estate. {Emma Davies (12)
